snippet: Mr. Milano’s backup tenor helped seal the seamless doo-wop sound of hits like “A Teenager in Love” and “Where or When.”
abstract: Fred Milano, one of the original members of Dion and the Belmonts, who wove his backup tenor tones into the musically seamless harmonies of 1950s and ’60s hits like A Teenager in Love and Where or When, dies at age 72.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Milano’s backup tenor helped seal the seamless doo-wop sound of hits like “A Teenager in Love” and “Where or When.”

headline.seo: Fred Milano of Dion and the Belmonts Dies at 72
headline.main: Fred Milano, an Original Member of Dion and the Belmonts, Dies at 72
headline.print_headline: Fred Milano, 72, Singer With Dion and the Belmonts
